snippet: "People say Tiananmen Square couldn't happen here. It can't right now because we're armed and we have a way to retaliate."    "By having 200 million armed Americans, the Government of the United States would never have the thought of becoming tyra...
lead_paragraph: "People say Tiananmen Square couldn't happen here. It can't right now because we're armed and we have a way to retaliate." "By having 200 million armed Americans, the Government of the United States would never have the thought of becoming tyrannical."
